publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises.

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises.
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Shona Robison*
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Alex Neil*, Colin Campbell*, Brian Adam*
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East-That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East-That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson
S1M-878 Parliament Meetings in the North East (lodged on 18 May 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan

S1M-878 Irene McGugan: Parliament Meetings in the North East—That the Parliament notes that there will be occasions when it will be necessary or expedient for it to meet outwith Edinburgh; acknowledges that this is a positive initiative, and invites the Parliamentary Bureau to consider locating the Parliament in the North East when the next opportunity arises. Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Colin Campbell, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mr David Davidson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan
